thread.title: Rick Steves’s Plan for a Better World: More Travel

author: Alexandra Wolfe
title: Rick Steves’s Plan for a Better World: More Travel
text:
Travel-book writer Rick Steves misses the days when American travelers would say, “Bon voyage!” Now, he finds, we’re more likely to say, “Have a safe trip.” As he sees it, Americans have become too wary of travel, especially to strife-torn regions such as Central America and the Middle East.
